about.info: Hi — I’m Daniel, a web developer with a strong focus on frontend technologies and experience working with WordPress, Shopify, and Shopware. I enjoy building clean, user-friendly web solutions and continuously refining my skills in UI/UX and backend development. My goal is to keep growing as a developer, learning new tools and approaches to create well-crafted, efficient, and engaging digital experiences.
about.subline: Let's collaborate and build something remarkable together!

skills.introduction: I build responsive frontends with modern JavaScript frameworks and tools. With experience in Shopify, Shopware, WordPress, and Angular, I focus on clean, efficient code and constant improvement.
skills.next: Also, I'm interested in diving into:

projects.headline: Projects
projects.info: Take a look at some of my recent projects — including a Pokédex built with the PokéAPI, a browser-based jump-and-run game, and a Kanban-style project manager made with Angular. Each demonstrates my approach to building interactive, user-friendly solutions with clean and thoughtful code.
projects.name: Daniel Kersten

contact.headline: Ready to work together?
contact.info: I’m always open to new opportunities where I can contribute my skills and continue growing as a developer. With experience in building responsive frontends and a solid understanding of modern web technologies, I enjoy tackling challenges that require creativity and clean, maintainable solutions.
contact.interest: If you’re looking for someone eager to learn, collaborate, and bring value to your next project, I’d love to hear from you. Let’s connect and create something great together.
contact.message-input: Hello Daniel, I am interested in...
contact.privacy-two: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.email-please: Please enter a valid email address
